title: Himi 642
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.loua
1.
Hiva ē Kainga Lotu
Pā mavava, fiefia!
Kuo me’a mei he Langi
Si’i Foha Mo’onia.
Ko e ‘aho ‘o e ‘Alo
Kuo toe hoko mai;
Mālō mo e ‘Eiki ‘ofa
‘Etau lave pē ai.
2.
Ka na’e ‘ikai faka’eiki
‘Ene me’a ki māmani.
Langilangi ne si’aki,
Tuku ia ki hēvani
Ne Ne toka mo e manu,
‘I he loki ‘o e fale na.
‘Oi he afeitaulalo
‘A e ‘Alo pele na!
3.
‘Amusia ‘a e tauhi sipi
He mamata me’a masani,
Mo fanongo ki he hiva
He kau ‘āngelo ‘i Langi!
Lau Kolōlia he ‘Otua,
Lau melino he kakai;
Tā ne’ine’i he fakamālō,
‘Uma’ā he fakafeta’i.
4.
Na’a mo kitaua foki
‘Oku kau he monū’ia.
Kuo pā mai ki Tonga ni
Hiva fakafiefia.
Si’i fonua ‘i ‘Oseni
Ne ‘ikai ke ngalo ai;
Ne ne ma’u hono ‘inasi
‘I he ‘ofa he Tamai.
5.
Tamasi’i ‘o Nāsaleti
Ke Ke hanga kia au;
Ko e koto angahala,
Fakalielia fau.
Ka ko hoku loto ‘eni:
Ke Ke hu ‘o toka ai.
Pea hoko ‘a Hēvani
Si’oku ‘ai’angakai.
6.
Ke Ke hanga foki, ‘Eiki,
Ki he ngaahi fu’u kakai
‘Oku nofo he po’uli
‘Ikai ma’u Kilisimasi.
Kae’uma’ā ho’ kau Sevāniti
He nau ō mo
e
Folofola;
Toki maama si’i Kakai na,
‘Ilo ki he ‘Eiki ‘ofa. *
C.P.W.B.
